content.text:
# 2010 President's Cup – Singles

Ivan Dodig
| runner   =  Igor Kunitsyn
| score    = 6–4, 6–3
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Igor Kunitsyn, who was last year's winner, reached the final, however he lost to Ivan Dodig 4–6, 3–6.

Mikhail Kukushkin (first round)

}}
